Id.description: The ID that identifies the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified resource.

BucketsAndRegions.description: S3 buckets and Regions to include/exclude in the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.

AwsOrg.description: The AWS Organizations ARN to use in the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.

properties.name: IsEnabled
properties.description: Specifies whether activity metrics are enabled or disabled.

type.description: Specifies whether activity metrics are enabled or disabled.

properties.name: IsEnabled
properties.description: Specifies whether advanced cost optimization metrics are enabled or disabled.

type.description: Specifies whether advanced cost optimization metrics are enabled or disabled.

properties.name: IsEnabled
properties.description: Specifies whether advanced data protection metrics are enabled or disabled.

type.description: Specifies whether advanced data protection metrics are enabled or disabled.

properties.name: IsEnabled
properties.description: Specifies whether detailed status codes metrics are enabled or disabled.

type.description: Specifies whether detailed status codes metrics are enabled or disabled.

properties.name: MaxDepth
properties.description: Max depth of prefixes of S3 key that Amazon S3 Storage Lens will analyze.

type.description: Max depth of prefixes of S3 key that Amazon S3 Storage Lens will analyze.

properties.name: Delimiter
properties.description: Delimiter to divide S3 key into hierarchy of prefixes.

type.description: Delimiter to divide S3 key into hierarchy of prefixes.

properties.name: MinStorageBytesPercentage
properties.description: The minimum storage bytes threshold for the prefixes to be included in the analysis.

type.description: The minimum storage bytes threshold for the prefixes to be included in the analysis.

properties.name: IsEnabled
properties.description: Specifies whether prefix-level storage metrics are enabled or disabled.

type.description: Specifies whether prefix-level storage metrics are enabled or disabled.

StorageLensGroupArn.description: The ARN for the Amazon S3 Storage Lens Group configuration.

StorageLensGroupSelectionCriteria.description: Selection criteria for Storage Lens Group level metrics

StorageLensGroupLevel.description: Specifies the details of Amazon S3 Storage Lens Group configuration.

properties.name: KeyId
properties.description: The ARN of the KMS key to use for encryption.

type.description: The ARN of the KMS key to use for encryption.

Encryption.description: Configures the server-side encryption for Amazon S3 Storage Lens report files with either S3-managed keys (SSE-S3) or KMS-managed keys (SSE-KMS).

types.description: Configures the server-side encryption for Amazon S3 Storage Lens report files with either S3-managed keys (SSE-S3) or KMS-managed keys (SSE-KMS).
Configures the server-side encryption for Amazon S3 Storage Lens report files with either S3-managed keys (SSE-S3) or KMS-managed keys (SSE-KMS).

S3BucketDestination.description: S3 bucket destination settings for the Amazon S3 Storage Lens metrics export.

properties.name: OutputSchemaVersion
properties.description: The version of the output schema to use when exporting Amazon S3 Storage Lens metrics.

type.description: The version of the output schema to use when exporting Amazon S3 Storage Lens metrics.

properties.name: Format
properties.description: Specifies the file format to use when exporting Amazon S3 Storage Lens metrics export.

type.description: Specifies the file format to use when exporting Amazon S3 Storage Lens metrics export.

properties.name: AccountId
properties.description: The AWS account ID that owns the destination S3 bucket.

type.description: The AWS account ID that owns the destination S3 bucket.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The ARN of the bucket to which Amazon S3 Storage Lens exports will be placed.

type.description: The ARN of the bucket to which Amazon S3 Storage Lens exports will be placed.

properties.name: Prefix
properties.description: The prefix to use for Amazon S3 Storage Lens export.

type.description: The prefix to use for Amazon S3 Storage Lens export.

CloudWatchMetrics.description: CloudWatch metrics settings for the Amazon S3 Storage Lens metrics export.

properties.name: IsEnabled
properties.description: Specifies whether CloudWatch metrics are enabled or disabled.

type.description: Specifies whether CloudWatch metrics are enabled or disabled.

DataExport.description: Specifies how Amazon S3 Storage Lens metrics should be exported.

StorageLensConfiguration.description: Specifies the details of Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.

properties.name: IsEnabled
properties.description: Specifies whether the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration is enabled or disabled.

type.description: Specifies whether the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration is enabled or disabled.

properties.name: StorageLensArn
properties.description: The ARN for the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.

type.description: The ARN for the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.

resource.description: The AWS::S3::StorageLens resource is an Amazon S3 resource type that you can use to create Storage Lens configurations.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A set of tags (key-value pairs) for this Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.

type.description: A set of tags (key-value pairs) for this Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.
